payment

Class Payment

  • java.lang.Object
    • payment.Payment

  • public class Payment
extends java.lang.Object
    Payment subpackage of CRS. Processes and calculates the prices for the current rental.
    Author:
    Aaron Cheng

    • Constructor Detail

      • Payment

        public Payment(java.lang.String vehicleID)
        Payment constructor. Takes a vehicle ID, and retrieves it's hourly, weekly and daily rates.

    • Method Detail

      • calculateTotalPrice

        public java.lang.String calculateTotalPrice(java.sql.Date startDate,
                                   java.sql.Date dueDate,
                                   java.sql.Date returnDate)
        Calculates the price of the rental, given two dates. Due dates will always be 11 AM of the date the rental is due. Only need to calculate rentalHours if and only if the rental itself is overdue.
        Parameters:
        startDate - The date the rental started
        dueDate - The date the rental is due
        returnDate - The date the rental is returned.
        Returns:
        The price of the rental to two decimal places.
        Pre:
        startDate < returnDate
        Post:
        totalPrice.decimalPlace = 2

        public java.lang.String calculateVehiclePrice(java.sql.Date startDate,
                                     java.sql.Date dueDate)
        Calculates a vehicle price ONLY given a start date, due date and return date. If you are making a rent, dueDate = returnDate
        Parameters:
        startDate -
        dueDate -
        returnDate -
        Returns:

        Parameters:
